# Medical Bay
1. For medical crew safety, the medical bay must not be placed on all access unless [color=#ff0000]Code Red[/color] is called.
2. The medical bay must be kept neat and tidy for patient health.
3. Chemicals should be kept in a stored locker or location and closed when not in use.
4. Defibrillators should be kept in their cabinets when not in use and should be charged whenever possible. - 1. It is recommended that spare batteries be kept next to defibrillator cabinets.
